snippet.title: Sea Chase for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Sea Chase is an action game, where you control a little yellow submarine searching for treasure.

Be aware of sea mines, the boat at the surface that throws explosive barrels, and a hostile submarine.

Once you have collected all the treasures (you need 10 per level) a rocket shows up that you can pick up and take revenge on the boat.


What I think:

Although repetitive this is a rather fun game. I also like how the treasures always look different, it makes the game addictive as you always wanna know what's the next treasure.
